column4: Hi all.  Can anyone recommend a stable PHP 5.2 backport for Edgy?
I've done one for Debian Sarge that *may* work with Edgy.
I found one on the forums from dotdeb, but it conflicted with just about everything related to PHP. :-)
Eh, I suspect a sarge package won't work on Edgy unless I compile it from scratch.
Well, let me see if it wrecks mine
Ok, it works. My gallery2 is up and OK.
Hm, ok.  Actually I'm tracking this problem closer and it may not be a PHP 5.1-related problem.
What's the URL for it, just in case?
It's a complete port of the etch apache2.2+php5.2+php4.4 to Sarge
There is a fair bit of stuff that won't run on 5.x
And paying clients want it, so 4.4 it is :-)
if you do want to build, I have (modified) source debs there too.
